original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, badges as b, users as u WHERE c.UserId = u.Id AND b.UserId = u.Id AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-24 06:46:49' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-19 20:34:06' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-12 15:11:36' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-24 06:46:49'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 20:34:06' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 15:11:36'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.UserId)
